issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
LiveView does not work with i18 folder on iOS.  If I change anything to i18 folder and save, it does not update to the iOS simulator and Device. But it works on Android Emulator and Device.

*Steps To Reproduce:*
1. Create a single window default Classic project.
2. Change something to *i118/en/string.xml* file.
3. Then Save and check the iOS device or simulator.


*Testing Environment:*
Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2,
Ti SDK: 4.1.0.GA,
iOS Simulator: 5,6(v8.4)                                                   
iOS Device: iPod(v8.4),                      
 Studio Version: 4.1.1

Thanks.
fields.summary: LiveView does not work with i18 folder on iOS.

comments.body:
Still, It's an issue with the latest environment

*Testing Environment:*
Command-Line Interface, version 5.3.1,
Ti SDK: 5.3.1.GA,
iOS Simulator: 5,6(v9.3) 
iOS Device: iPhone 5s(v9.3.2), 
Studio Version: 4.6.0

I tested with the latest Ti SDK version and it works as expected.
